name: jcwp left right key navigation
author: jaschahal

sections.description:
This plugin gives you an option to goto next post by pressing right key twice. Pressing Right arrow key once gives hint on what post is next. Same applies to Left arrow key. When its clicked once a simple title for next post is shown, Pressed twice takes you to previous post.

You can follow me on Twitter https://twitter.com/jschahal or
like my facebook page http://www.facebook.com/jaspreetchahal.org to get updates on some not so exciting things that I do.

Visit my site http://jaspreetchahal.org to get help on this plugin or more precisely go to http://jaspreetchahal.org/wordpress-left-right-key-navigation-plugin

Screenshots ==-

  1. A screen shot of the options page
  2. Shows usage

Donations

If you would like to donate to help support future development of this plugin, please go to Jaspreet Chahal
sections.installation:
1. Upload unzipped plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the Plugin Options on left menu under Settings > JCWP Left Right key.
sections.faq:
• Are there any themes or color selection for post preview title?
    Well! I think I may add that when I get a chance. Leave your feedback here http://jaspreetchahal.org/wordpress-left-right-key-navigation-plugin
  • Have you written other plugins?
    Yes I have. A Few. Just goto my profile and check out my work. Optionally Goto http://jaspreetchahal.org and search “WordPress plugins” category

short_description: This plugin enables left and right key post navigation.
